Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: I need to read through the long process description carefully and identify areas that are vague ambiguous or where more detail would be helpful

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Let me break down the process and identify potential question areas 1 Initial Contact and Documentation Review What triggers the process Is it just owner contact or are there other ways up to 15 Overall Process What metrics define success Cycle time Owner satisfaction

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Let me structure these into categories that match the prompts requirements Missing details Decision criteria Roles responsibilities Timing sequencing Exceptions Overall process governance

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Let me draft the questions Documentation and Verification 1 What are the most common reasons for documentation being rejected or requiring updates and are there any city specific compliance requirements that frequently cause delays up to Metrics and Improvement 19 How frequently is the onboarding process reviewed or updated and what drives those changes regulatory updates feedback or performance issues

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Let me review them against the requirements Missing details Questions 1 6 14 15 address gaps in the description Decision criteria Questions 2 3 5 8 10 11 13 ask about how decisions are made Roles responsibilities Questions 5 7 8 12 16 17 clarify who does what Timing sequencing Questions 6 12 15 16 18 ask about when things happen and order Exceptions Questions 14 15 specifically address exceptions Overall governance Questions 17 18 19 cover process ownership and improvement
